definition: the act of rotating as if on an axis
details:
noun
- the act of rotating as if on an axis
= example: the act of rotating as if on an axis
= synonyms: rotary motion
- a planned recurrent sequence of crops or personnel
= example: a planned recurrent sequence of crops or personnel
- a single complete turn
= example: a single complete turn
= synonyms: gyration, revolution
- (mathematics) a transformation in which the coordinate axes are rotated by a fixed angle about the origin
